TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The root of an herb called Polygala senega. It has been used in some cultures to treat certain medical problems, including problems of the respiratory system.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "raíz de senega"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Raíz de una planta llamada Polygala senega. Se ha usado en algunas culturas para tratar ciertos problemas médicos, incluso problemas del aparato respiratorio.
